pkgmetadata.longdescription: Read, Iteratively Filter, and Analyze Multiple ECG Datasets // Allows users to quickly load multiple patients' electrocardiographic (ECG) data at once and conduct relevant time analysis of heart rate variability (HRV) without manual edits from a physician or data cleaning specialist. The package provides the unique ability to iteratively filter, plot, and store time analysis results in a data frame while writing plots to a predefined folder. This streamlines the workflow for HRV analysis across multiple datasets. Methods are based on Rodrguez-Liares et al. (2011) doi:10.1016/j.cmpb.2010.05.012. Examples of applications using this package include Kwon et al. (2022) doi:10.1007/s10286-022-00865-2 and Lawrence et al. (2023) doi:10.1016/j.autneu.2022.103056.
